## ISlide.SlideNumber property

返回幻灯片的数量。 幻灯片的索引[`Slides`](../../ipresentation/slides)集合总是等于 SlideNumber - 1. 读/写Int32.

```csharp
public int SlideNumber { get; set; }
```
